DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter study ass survival success rate six short implant ( ANKYLOS C/X 6.6 mm ) edentulous maxilla support fix full-arch bridge 5 year function .
DOC.brief_title: Implant-fixed Restorations With ANKYLOS 6.6 mm Implants Edentulous Maxilla - A 5-year Follow-up Study
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : For inclusion study subject must meet following criterion : 1 . Aged 1880 year inclusion 2 . Signed informed consent 3 . In need fullarch restoration maxilla The following consider inclusion need fulfil Implant Placement ( Visit 3 ) : 4 . Maxilla : totally edentulous , fulfil follow criterion : History edentulism : ≥ 6 month Minimum bone height : ≥ 7 mm Minimum bone width : ≥ 5.5 mm 5 . Mandible : antagonistic natural dentition tooth/implant borne rehabilitation use create stable occlusal fit new fullarch restoration upper jaw EXCLUSION CRITERIA Any follow regarded criterion exclusion study : 1 . Unlikely able comply study procedure accord Investigators judgement 2 . History bone augmentation maxilla within 6 month prior surgery 3 . Uncontrolled pathologic process oral cavity 4 . Bruxism 5 . Smoking > 10 cigarette per day 6 . Present alcohol drug abuse 7 . History radiation therapy head neck region 8 . History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery 9 . Condition would compromise postoperative tissue heal osseointegration 10 . Bisphosphonates medication would compromise postoperative heal osseointegration . 11 . Known pregnancy time inclusion 12 . Current former participation clinical study may interfere present study 13 . Involvement plan conduct study
